name: Magnetic Bonds
description:
Magnetic Bonds is a hybrid between a visual novel and turn-based RPG. Players can explore a science-fantasy universe, befriending characters and building relationships as they progress through battles. This is planned to be an episodic series, with episodes released at regular intervals. Currently, the game contains 1 episode. Future episodes will be in the form of an updated download package, and once downloaded, the story will pick up from where you left off! 

Current Game Length: 1-1.5 hours (Relaxed pace) Features
  • A turn-based battle system that combines quick-thinking and resource management!
  • An epic storyline inspired by shonen manga!
  • Robust cooking system!
  • Hand-drawn artwork!
  • Over 600 voiced lines!
Released Episodes

So far, there is one released episode, which takes about an hour and half to complete at a relaxed pace. Consider this a tutorial and introduction to the story. Episode 2 planned for late 2021, is a free update that will contain the following features in addition to continuing the story. 

  • A training mode for those who want to grind or enjoy extra battles
  • Cook whenever you want for additional bonuses, also, expand your ingredient selection and recipe selection by using gold earned from battles
  • An additional bonding-minigame on the Scarecrow's Haven
  • Bestiary and Datalog
  • More playable characters
  • And more!

The number of episodes will be indicated by the version number. The version number will increase by 1 for each additional episode.
